name: repel
effect: Used outside of battle : Trainer will skip encounters with wild Pokémon of a lower level than the lead party Pokémon. This effect wears off after the trainer takes 100 steps.
short_effect: For 100 steps, prevents wild encounters of level lower than your party’s lead Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An item that drives away wild Pokémon so you won’t encounter them for a short time.
